description: Iranians say they are caught between their country's regime and Israeli destruction as the conflict intensifies.

title: Centrifuges at Iran's Natanz site likely destroyed, nuclear watchdog says
description: Rafael Grossi tells the BBC this was as a result of power cuts caused by Israeli strikes on Friday.

description: So far this tax season, the IRS has received more than 90 million income tax returns for 2022.

title: France's Macron Says Trump Has Made Offer For Israel-Iran Ceasefire
description: French President Emmanuel Macron said on Monday that U.S. President Donald Trump had made an offer for a ceasefire between Israel and Iran.

title: Trump To Cut Short G7 Summit Due To Middle East Situation
description: -U.S. President Donald Trump will return to Washington from the G7 summit in Canada on Monday night to attend to many "important matters," White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt said.

title: Live Updates: Trump Leaving G7 Early to Deal With Israel-Iran Conflict
description: The president’s decision to leave the G7 summit in Canada came after Israel and Iran entered a fifth day of back-and-forth attacks. Israel has been pressing the United States to intervene militarily.
author: The New York Times

title: With No Clear Off-Ramp, Israel’s War With Iran May Last Weeks, Not Days
description: Israel and Iran both have little incentive to stop and no obvious route to outright victory. Much depends on President Trump.
author: Patrick Kingsley

title: Markets are shrugging off the Israel-Iran conflict. Some strategists warn of complacency
description: Global equity markets rose on Monday as fighting in the Middle East escalated.

title: OpenAI wins $200 million U.S. defense contract
description: Months after announcing a partnership with defense-tech startup Anduril, OpenAI has secured a $200 million contract with the Department of Defense.

title: Jane Goodall chimpanzee conservation project in Tanzania hit by USAID cuts
description: US agency had pledged almost $30m over five years to Hope Through Action initiative, which was launched in 2023The US government funding cuts will hit a chimpanzee conservation project nurtured by the primatologist Jane Goodall.USAID has been subjected to swingeing cuts under Donald Trump, with global effects that are still unfolding. Now it has emerged that the agency will withdraw from the Hope Through Action project managed by the Jane Goodall Institute (JGI). USAID had pledged $29.5m (£22m) over five years to the project, which was designed to protect endangered chimpanzees and their habitats in western Tanzania. Continue reading...
author: Tabitha John

title: Send in armed UN troops to protect aid convoys or risk ‘dystopia’, says expert
description: UN rapporteur calls for move as food deliveries are attacked and starvation becomes a weapon of war in Gaza and SudanUN peacekeepers should be routinely deployed to protect aid convoys from attack in places such as Gaza and Sudan, a senior United Nations expert has proposed.With starvation increasingly used as a weapon of war, Michael Fakhri said armed UN troops were now required to ensure that food reached vulnerable populations. Continue reading...
author: Mark Townsend

title: Who was Arthur Folasa Ah Loo? Fashion designer killed at 'No Kings' protest; police say he was not the target
description: Arthur Folasa Ah Loo, a celebrated Samoan fashion designer known for dressing stars, was tragically killed during a protest in Salt Lake City. He was struck by gunfire, not intended for him, while attending a "No Kings" protest. Ah Loo's vibrant designs, celebrating his Pacific Islander roots, had earned him acclaim and recognition within the Polynesian community and beyond.
author: TOI World Desk

title: Middle East crisis: Donald Trump to leave G7 summit early over Iran-Israel conflict; warns Tehran to evacuate 'immediately'
description: Amid escalating tensions between Israel and Iran, US President Donald Trump will depart the G7 summit early. Tensions in the Middle East dominated discussions among world leaders in Canada, prompting urgent diplomacy. Trump issued a stark warning to Tehran, urging immediate evacuation and negotiation.
author: TOI World Desk

title: Pentagon expands Middle East response as Israel, Iran trade strikes
description: U.S. refueling aircraft and warships have been dispatched to safeguard U.S. interests as the deadly conflict shows no sign of abating.
author: Dan Lamothe, Abigail Hauslohner

title: Trump says ‘everyone should immediately evacuate Tehran’
author: Sammy Westfall
